title: Tofuberry Smoothie
instructions: Place tofu, soy milk, yogurt, raspberries, banana, and orange juice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour in glasses over ice or vanilla ice cream.

title: Berry Apricot Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups Original Unsweetened Almond Breeze Almondmilk
instructions: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth.

title: Avocado Banana Nut Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, avocado, banana, peanut butter, ice cubes, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Kiwi-Banana-Pineapple-Orange Smoothie
instructions: Blend kiwi, banana, orange juice, pineapple, coconut water, yogurt, and agave nectar in a blender until smooth.

title: Avocado Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend avocado, orange juice, vanilla yogurt, ice cubes, strawberries, honey, and flax seed meal together in a blender until smooth, at least 45 seconds.

title: Papaya Passion Smoothie
ingredients: 2 cups papaya - peeled, seeded and cubed
instructions: Place papaya, milk, sugar, condensed milk, yogurt, cream cheese, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Cucumber Pear Smoothie
instructions: Layer cucumber, pear, pineapple, white beans, parsley, and ginger in a blender; add water. Cover and blend mixture until smooth, adding more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Sugar-Free PB&J; Smoothies
instructions: Blend strawberries, milk, peanut butter, oats, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 3 whole frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1/4 cup whipped cream, or more to taste (optional)
instructions: Blend banana, strawberries, milk, yogurt, pumpkin puree, peanut butter, brown sugar, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth; add ice cubes and again blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into 4 glasses and top with whipped cream and a pinch of cinnamon.

title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, peanut butter and soy milk. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and drizzle with honey for garnish.

title: Matcha-Berry Swirl Smoothie
instructions:
Combine spinach, 1 cup orange juice, peaches, pineapple, 1 halved banana, and green tea powder in a blender; blend until combined. Pour smoothie into a glass.
Rinse out the blender.
Combine 1 cup orange juice, raspberries, strawberries, and 1 halved banana in the blender; blend until combined. Pour berry smoothie into a separate glass.
Combine smoothies by pouring them at the same time from opposite sides of the serving glass.

title: Vanilla-Banana Smoothie
instructions: Place banana and vanilla ice cream into a blender. Pour in vanilla extract, orange juice, and milk. Puree until thick and smooth.

title: Any Way You Want It Kale Smoothie
ingredients: 3 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
instructions: Blend kale, yogurt, and peanuts together in a blender until smooth. Add milk, banana, strawberries, and maple syrup and blend until desired consistency is reached.

title: Strawberry-Banana-Peanut Butter Smoothie
instructions: Place yogurt, peanut butter, banana, strawberries, and ice cubes into a blender. Puree until smooth.

title: New Year Detox Green Smoothie
ingredients: 8 fluid ounces coconut water (such as Harmless Harvest®)
1 scoop vanilla protein powder (such as Vega®)
instructions: Combine coconut water, green tea, banana, spinach, protein powder, and mint in a blender; blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes.

title: Super Healthy Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Place the blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, pomegranate and mango juices, milk, and honey into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Fig Smoothie
instructions: Place the bananas, figs, milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: PB Banana Oat Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
instructions: Put banana, ice, oats, yogurt, skim milk, peanut butter, honey, and cinnamon, respectively, in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Hurricane Smoothie
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces whiskey, (such as Black Velvet™)
2 fluid ounces cherry vodka (such as UV Red™)
instructions: Place the strawberries, bananas, raspberries, yogurt, lemonade mix, and ice cubes into a blender. Pour in the vodka, rum, whiskey, cherry vodka. Puree until smooth, and pour into two large glasses to serve.

title: Blueberry Mango Smoothie
instructions: Grind chia seeds in a food processor until pulverized; add yogurt, mango juice, blueberries, mango, and vanilla extract and blend until smooth.

title: Overnight Oats Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk, divided
1 teaspoon maple syrup, or to taste
instructions:
Combine oats and 2/3 cup almond milk in a bowl; refrigerate until oats have absorbed the liquid, 8 hours to overnight.
Combine oats-almond milk mixture, remaining almond milk, banana, 1 cup blueberries, vanilla extract, and maple syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Pour smoothie into 2 bowls and top with coconut, 1 tablespoon blueberries, and chia seeds.

title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie from Reddi-wip®
ingredients: 1/4 cup vanilla nonfat yogurt with low-calorie sweetener
instructions:
Place strawberries, banana and yogurt in blender container. Pulse until fruit is well blended, scraping sides of container, if necessary.
Add ice; pulse until ice is well blended.
Pour into glass and top with one serving (2 tablespoons) Reddi-wip. Serve immediately.

title: Green Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend spinach, banana, coconut milk, mango, and coconut water in a blender until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with raspberries, blueberries, granola, coconut flakes, almonds, and chia seeds.

title: Banana Berry Smoothie with Truvia® Natural Sweetener
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Truvia® natural sweetener spoonable, plus
instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender. Blend on high until smooth.
Enjoy.

title: Chocolate Decadence Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 pint So Delicious® Dairy Free Chocolate Coconutmilk Frozen Dessert
1/4 cup So Delicious® Dairy Free Unsweetened Coconutmilk Beverage
instructions:
Mix all ingredients in a blender or food processor until smooth.
Freeze for 10 minutes. Add your toppings and enjoy!

title: Quick Kale and Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup frozen strawberries, or more to taste
instructions: Blend kale, banana, coconut milk, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Paleo Apple Pie Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or as desired
instructions: Layer apple, pineapple, cashew butter, coconut, flax meal, vanilla extract, and cinnamon into a blender; add almond milk. Blend mixture until smooth.

title: Blueberry Breeze Coconut Smoothie
instructions: Combine blueberries, coconut milk, green apple, flax seeds, vanilla extract, and stevia in a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Mango Pineapple Green Smoothie
instructions: Place pineapple, mango, banana, spinach, orange juice, and ice, respectively, in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Perfect Peach Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Blend peach, banana, orange juice, soy milk, and flax seed in a blender until smooth.

title: Dairy-Free Chocolate Peanut Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, peanut butter, and cocoa powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Chocolate Peach Smoothie
instructions: Place ice cubes, peach, and frozen yogurt in a blender in order listed; blend until smooth.

title: Smoothie for a Boss!
ingredients: 15 slices frozen peach, or more to taste
instructions: Pour milk into a blender; add peaches, banana, and yogurt. Blend mixture until smooth; add chocolate sauce and blend until smooth.

title: Vegan Morning Smoothie
instructions: Layer banana, spinach, mixed fruit, flax meal, protein powder, chia seeds, and matcha powder in a blender in the order listed; add enough water to cover. Cover blender and blend until smooth.

title: Banana Smoothie I
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, milk, vanilla, egg and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and top with a pinch of cinnamon.

title: All-Around Good Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, blend the milk, yogurt, banana, protein supplement, flax seed, honey, and strawberries until smooth.

title: Blueberry Vanilla Graham Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste
instructions: Combine coconut water, banana, blueberries, kale, spinach, dates, almond butter, hemp seed hearts, flax seeds, oats, and protein powder in a blender. Cover and puree until smooth. Top with graham cracker crumbs.

title: Easy Pumpkin Pie Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cinnamon graham cracker, crushed and divided
instructions: Blend almond milk, pumpkin, ice cubes, banana, brown sugar, 1/2 the crushed cinnamon graham cracker, wheat germ, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth. Garnish individual servings with remaining graham cracker crumbs.

title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, chocolate syrup, milk and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Moringa Coconut Smoothie
instructions: Layer bananas, peaches, coconut milk, moringa powder, and almond butter in a blender; add water. Blend mixture until very smooth, at least 1 minute.

title: Uncle Monkey Smoothie
instructions: Blend bananas, yogurt, ice cubes, peanut butter, milk, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry Orange Coconut Smoothie
instructions: Place the strawberries, orange, coconut milk, and ice cubes in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth.

title: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
ingredients: 3/4 cup pineapple and orange juice blend
instructions: Place the banana, strawberries, kiwi, vanilla frozen yogurt, and pineapple and orange juice blend in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Green Tea Pear Smoothie
instructions: Mix almond milk and protein powder together in a cup; pour into a blender. Add spinach, pear, cashews, and green tea powder; blend until smooth.

title: Apple and Kale Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup Nordica 1% or Fat Free Cottage Cheese
1 cup chopped frozen kale or spinach
instructions: Combine cottage cheese, applesauce, kale, banana, water, ice, lemon juice, vanilla (if using) and cinnamon in a blender. Blend on high speed for 2 minutes or until very smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Elvis Smoothie (Almond and Banana)
ingredients: 2 large ripe bananas, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions:
Place banana chunks into a sealable plastic bag and freeze until solid, 1 to 2 hours to overnight.
Place frozen bananas into a blender with skim milk, almond butter, and vanilla extract; blend until smooth. Pour into a large glass and garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon to serve.

title: Cinnamon Acai Smoothie with Truvia® Natural Sweetener
ingredients: 2 cups fresh seasonal berries (strawberries, blueberries, whatever you like)
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Serve chilled..

title: Zucchini and Carrot Smoothie
instructions: Blend zucchini, carrot, yogurt, milk, oats, honey, and flax seeds in a blender until smooth.

title: Lean Green Smoothie
ingredients: 3 cups honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cubed
instructions: Place the honeydew melon, ice cubes, grapes, cucumber, broccoli, and mint into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.

title: Cherry Almond Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, mix yogurt, oranges, banana, half-and-half and almond extract. Blend until smooth.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
instructions: Place bananas, milk, peanut butter, honey, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Mango-Peach Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup orange juice, or as needed
instructions: Place the peach, mango, soy milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Matcha Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as desired
1/2 teaspoon matcha green tea powder, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice cubes, orange juice, banana, and matcha powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Skinny Black Forest Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chia seeds, or to taste (optional)
instructions: Place baby spinach, cherries, almond milk, rolled oats, cocoa powder, and sweetener in a blender. Blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Pour into a glass and top with chia seeds.

title: Creamy Pumpkin Pie Smoothie Shake
instructions:
Combine pumpkin, ice cream, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg in a blender; blend until smooth. Add ice; blend until smooth.
Place 1/3 of the graham cracker crumbs in the bottom of 2 small glasses. Fill glasses halfway with blended pumpkin mixture. Top with another 1/3 of the graham cracker crumbs. Pour in remaining pumpkin mixture. Top each glass with 1 tablespoon whipped cream and remaining graham cracker crumbs.

title: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Amaretto Smoothie
instructions: In a blender combine amaretto, milk and ice cream. Blend until smooth. Pour over ice into 4 glasses.

title: Fuzzy Navel Smoothie - Alcohol-Free
ingredients: 2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced
1 cup orange juice, or more to taste
instructions: Blend peaches in a blender until smooth. Add ice cubes, orange juice, orange yogurt, and orange juice concentrate; blend until desired consistency is reached.

title: Caramel Apple Smoothie from Mott's®
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Sour Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, orange, limes, lemon, kiwi, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Lemon Berry Smoothie
instructions: Place yogurt, milk, ice cubes, blueberries, strawberries, and lemonade mix in a blender. Pulse until smooth and creamy.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Berry Oat Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
instructions:
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Garnish with additional sliced bananas and oats, if preferred.

title: Orange Banana Smoothie with Chia
ingredients: 1/3 cup vanilla-flavored or plain Greek yogurt
3 mandarin or clementine oranges - peeled, pith removed, sectioned
instructions: Place yogurt, oranges, banana, chia seeds and ice cubes in blender container. Cover and process until smooth.

title: Tasty Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend yogurt, milk, strawberries, oats, flax, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Strawberry-Orange Creme Smoothies
ingredients: 2 (5.3 ounce) containers Yoplait® Greek 100 Orange Creme yogurt
instructions:
In blender, place ingredients. Cover; blend on high speed about 10 seconds or until smooth.
Pour into 2 glasses. Serve immediately.

title: Carrot Cake Smoothie
instructions: Pulse carrot and mango together in a blender until roughly chopped. Add peach, soy milk, cinnamon, allspice, and ginger; blend until smooth.

title: Melon-Blackberry Smoothie
instructions:
Place the banana, honeydew melon, blackberries, wheat germ, and almond milk into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.
Divide ice cubes into two tall glasses, and pour the smoothie over the ice.

title: Green Monster - Spinach Smoothie
instructions: Layer yogurt, banana, and blueberries in a blender, respectively. Add as much spinach to blender that will fit; pour in water. Blend on high speed until smooth, adding the remaining spinach if needed. Add ice for a colder and thicker smoothie. Add more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Kale, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
4 cubes ice, or more if desired
instructions: Blend bananas, almond milk, kale, ice, and peanut butter in a blender until smooth.

title: Easy Power Smoothie
ingredients: 1 apple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
instructions: Put milk, eggs, banana, apple, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla extract into a blender bowl, respectively; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Good-To-Go Morning Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, oats, apple juice, banana, and peanut butter together in a blender or food processor until smooth.

title: Berry Good Smoothie II
instructions: In a blender combine nectarine, strawberries, blueberries, milk powder and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.

title: Peanut Butter Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend strawberries, yogurt, milk, peanut butter, and brown sugar together in a blender for 2 minutes; let rest for 10 seconds. Blend until smooth, another 2 minutes.

title: Tasty Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 2 teaspoons maple syrup, or more to taste
instructions: Blend milk, banana, apricots, yogurt, wheat germ, oat bran, and maple syrup in a blender until smooth and frothy.

title: Peach Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, peaches, bananas, orange juice, sugar, and ice in a blender on high until the ice is crushed and the smoothie is to your desired consistency.

title: Apricot Date Smoothie
instructions: Break bananas into pieces; place into blender. Add apricots and dates; pour in almond milk. Blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Nutella® Smoothie
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, strawberries, and chocolate-hazelnut spread together in a blender until smooth.

title: Cherry Berry Blast Smoothie
instructions: Combine strawberries, yogurt, almond milk, and frozen cherries in a blender; add ice. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Jumping Ginger Smoothie
ingredients: 1 leaf kale leaf, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, or more to taste
instructions: Blend water, avocado, parsley, apple, carrot, lemon, kale, ginger, ice cubes, and flax seeds in a blender on high until smooth, 10 to 15 seconds.

title: Kale Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup water, or more as needed
instructions: Layer avocado, mango, kale, banana, white beans, and water in a blender; blend until smooth, adding more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Honey-Mango Smoothie
instructions: Place the mango, sugar, and honey in a blender pitcher; pour in the milk and lemon juice, and blend until smooth. Divide the ice cubes between two serving glasses. Pour the mango smoothie over ice to serve.

title: Dana's Tropical Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
instructions: Combine undrained can of pineapples, yogurt, banana, and ice cubes in a blender. Blend while adding orange juice until fruit is pureed and it is the desired consistency.

title: Ginger Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
3 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, cut into thirds
instructions: Blend water, blueberries, grapes, apple, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and slushy.

title: Avocado Blueberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend blueberries, yogurt, almond milk, water, and avocado in a blender until smooth.

title: Banana and Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine the banana, strawberries, cinnamon, milk, and food coloring in a blender; blend until smooth; serve immediately.

title: Banana Split Smoothie
instructions: Blend oats and chia seeds in a blender until powdery; add pineapple juice, chocolate soy milk, pineapple chunks, strawberries, and banana and blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, strawberries, almonds, and water into a blender. Blend to mix, then add the ice cubes and puree until smooth. Add the protein powder, and continue mixing until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds.

title: Jalapeno Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon chopped jalapeno pepper, or to taste
instructions: Layer banana, spinach, mango, and jalapeno pepper in a blender; add water and blend until smooth, adding more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Raspberry Chocolate Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, blend the soy milk, sorbet, raspberries, and banana until smooth. Garnish with mint to serve.

title: Back to the Basics Smoothie
ingredients: 1 frozen Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
instructions: In a blender, combine mandarin oranges, banana, apple and tofu. Pour in orange juice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Green Smoothie with Maca Powder
instructions: Layer pineapple, banana, spinach, avocado, almond butter, and maca powder in a blender; pour in water. Blend until smooth.

title: Mixed Fruit Smoothie with Goji Berries
instructions: Blend fruit, soy milk, goji berries, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Banana Smoothie
instructions:
Spoon pumpkin puree into a resealable bag and freeze, 8 hours to overnight.
Remove pumpkin from freezer and allow to soften at room temperature, 5 to 10 minutes.
Pour milk into the blender; add pumpkin, banana, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth, about 3 minutes.

title: Breakfast Banana Green Smoothie
ingredients: 2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
1 carrot, peeled and cut into large chunks
3/4 cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt, or to taste
instructions: Put spinach, banana, carrot, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Sesame Mango Smoothie
instructions: Layer banana, mango, cucumber, spinach, cashew butter, and sesame seeds in a blender, in the order mentioned; add water. Blend until smoothie is desired consistency, adding more water if desired.

title: Purple Monstrosity Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: 2 frozen bananas, skins removed and cut in chunks
instructions: Place bananas, blueberries and juice in a blender, puree. Use honey and/or vanilla to taste. Use more or less liquid depending on the thickness you want for your smoothie.

title: Peaches 'N Cream Banana Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 packet peaches and cream flavor instant oatmeal
2 packets granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) (optional)
instructions: Place the milk, yogurt, banana, instant oatmeal, sweetener, and ice cubes into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Strawberry Orange Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend the orange juice, strawberries, banana, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth and frothy.

title: Healthy Pumpkin Smoothie
instructions: Combine vanilla soy milk, pumpkin puree, ice, banana, vanilla protein powder, and ground cinnamon in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Quick Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
instructions: Blend oats and chia seeds together in a blender to a fine consistency. Add strawberries, yogurt, banana, almond milk, and vanilla extract; blend until smooth.

title: Rum and Raisin Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, rum, honey, raisins, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Coconut and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend coconut milk, ice cream, bananas, and honey in a blender or food processor until smooth.

title: Quick Kale and Turmeric Smoothie
ingredients: 3 leaves kale, large stems discarded, leaves chopped
instructions: Blend ice cubes, almond milk, banana, kale, flax seed meal, ginger, turmeric root, almond butter, stevia powder, cayenne pepper, and ground black pepper together in a blender until smooth.

title: Simple Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend yogurt, apple juice, honey, bananas, milk and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

title: Summer Crunch Smoothie
instructions: Combine frozen fruit and pomegranate seeds in a blender. Add water, orange juice, vanilla yogurt, and milk; blend until smooth, about 2 minutes.

title: Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
instructions:
Blend blueberries, 1/2 banana, water, cashew butter, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl.
Top smoothie with sliced banana, almonds, and coconut.

title: Coconut Avocado Smoothie
instructions: Combine avocado, yogurt, milk, cream of coconut, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Purple Power Punch Smoothie (My Kids' Fave)
ingredients: 1/2 cup nonfat vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
3 tablespoons turbinado sugar (such as Sugar in the Raw®)
instructions: Pulse yogurt, strawberries, water, powdered milk, banana, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, and protein powder together in a blender until well-mixed. Add ice, sugar, and honey and blend until smooth.

title: Banana-Orange Smoothie
instructions: Place banana, orange, soy milk, and ginger in an electric blender. Process until ingredients are blended and smooth.

title: Banana Walnut Smoothie
instructions: Combine bananas, pineapple, cashew butter, and walnuts in a blender. Add water and blend until smooth, adding more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Boost Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup plain low fat Greek-style yogurt
2 tablespoons KRAFT All Natural Peanut Butter
instructions:
Blend all ingredients except ice in blender until smooth.
Add ice; blend until thickened.
Serve immediately.

title: Oranginger Smoothie
ingredients: 2 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Blend orange, carrots, grapes, ice cubes, water, and ginger in a blender until smooth.

title: Groovie Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine bananas, frozen strawberries, yogurt and milk. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Dairy-Free Pumpkin Spice Smoothie
ingredients: 3/4 cup almond milk, or more as needed
instructions: Place almond milk, pumpkin puree, banana, protein powder, and pumpkin pie spice in a blender. Blend until smooth, 15 to 30 seconds. If mixture is too thick, add more almond milk or water to achieve desired consistency.

title: Heather and Kristen's PB and Chocolate Extravaganza Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can cola-flavored carbonated beverage (such as Coca-Cola®)
instructions: Blend cola, vanilla ice cream, ice cubes, peanut butter, chocolate syrup, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry Raspberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend strawberries, raspberries, milk, yogurt, honey, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Vanilla Pumpkin Pie Smoothie
ingredients: 8 ounces pumpkin pie filling (such as Libby's®)
instructions: Combine pumpkin pie filling, frozen yogurt, ice, soy milk, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Colada Smoothie
instructions: Blend coconut water, peaches, kiwis, banana, strawberries, honey, ground ginger, and wheat germ together in a blender on medium speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: Simple Summer Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, strawberries, blueberries, cherries, and ice cubes into a blender. Pour in the orange juice, vanilla yogurt, and honey. Puree until smooth.

title: Lemon Spinach Mint Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, or more to taste
1 cup cold water, or as needed to cover
instructions: Combine spinach, banana, avocado, kiwi, lemon juice, mint, almonds, maple syrup, and flax seeds in a blender. Add enough water to almost cover ingredients; blend until smooth. Add ice and blend thoroughly.

title: Groovy Green Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, grapes, yogurt, apple and spinach into a blender. Cover, and blend until smooth, stopping frequently to push down anything stuck to the sides. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
instructions:
Blend the orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add the water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break the bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending on a lower speed until the banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

title: Cold Cocoa Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine ice cream, milk, whipped cream, hot chocolate mix and crushed cookies. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large chilled glass.

title: Chocopeanutbanana Smoothie
instructions: Blend the banana, skim milk, peanut butter, and chocolate syrup in a blender until smooth. Pour into a glass to serve.

title: Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie II
instructions: Pour the apple juice and pineapple into a blender; add the yogurt, pineapple chunks, and frozen strawberries and blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Peach Smoothie
instructions: Pour soy milk into a blender and add vanilla ice cream, frozen strawberries, fresh strawberries, and peach slices. Blend until smooth and pour into a large glass.

title: Breakfast-to-Go Smoothie
instructions: Blend milk, blueberries, Greek yogurt, oats, and flax seed in a blender until smooth.

title: Chocolate Cherry Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup plain low fat Greek-style yogurt
2 tablespoons KRAFT Peanut Butter with Chocolate
1/2 cup pitted dark sweet cherries (fresh or frozen)
instructions:
Blend all ingredients except ice in blender until smooth.
Add ice; blend until thickened.
Serve immediately.

title: Secret Ingredient Smoothie
ingredients: 1/3 cup milk, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste (optional)
instructions:
Put romaine lettuce into the bottom of a blender pitcher; add enough milk to cover completely and blend on High until smooth.
Drop one strawberry at a time into the blender while still running on High and allow the berry to blend completely before adding the next. Blend one banana chunk at a time into the mixture in the same manner as the strawberries. Thin the smoothie with additional milk to keep smoothie blending properly. Blend vanilla extract into the smoothie.

title: Orange Banana Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine milk, oranges, banana, sugar, salt and yogurt. Blend for about 1 minute. Insert ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Banana Banana Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Place banana, banana extract, milk, yogurt, and sugar into a blender. Blend until smooth and serve.

title: Kale Banana Smoothie
instructions: Put coconut water, banana, avocado, kale, lemon juice, and cayenne pepper in blender; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: PBnJ "Workday" Smoothie
instructions: Place strawberries, banana, water, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth, gradually adding more water if a thinner smoothie is desired. Add peanut butter blend until smooth.

title: Sweet Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon peanut butter, or more to taste
1 tablespoon manuka honey, or more to taste
instructions: Combine bananas, yogurt, almond milk, ice cubes, peanut butter, and honey in a blender or high-speed blender (such as Vitamix(R)); blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine soy milk, oats, banana and strawberries. Add vanilla and sugar if desired. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Pina Colada Smoothie (Vegan)
ingredients: 3 cubes ice cubes, or as needed
instructions: Blend ice, banana, pineapple, coconut milk, soy milk, agave nectar, flax seed, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth. Pour smoothie into a tall glass.

title: Vanilla Banamango Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, or to taste
instructions: Pour orange juice into the pitcher of a blender and add mango, frozen banana, carrots, vanilla yogurt, ice cubes, and ginger. Pulse several times to crush ice, then blend until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: Flax Seed Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 frozen banana, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Place the banana, strawberries, flax seed meal, and soy milk into a blender. Puree until smooth.

title: Banana Hemp Seed Smoothie
instructions: Layer bananas, peach slices, almond butter, and hemp seeds in a blender; pour in water. Cover and blend until smooth.

title: Hala Kahiki Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend oranges, spinach, water, pineapple, grapes, ice, and flax seed in a blender until smooth.

title: Summery Afternoon Smoothie
instructions: Blend milk, mango, strawberries, yogurt, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pina Colada Power Honey Smoothie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste
instructions: Combine water, coconut milk, pineapple chunks, ice, honey, and vanilla protein powder in a blender. Blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes.

title: Cherry Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup low-fat Greek-style yogurt (such as Fage®)
instructions: Place the cherries, banana, lemon juice, yogurt, ice cubes, and almond extract into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Blueberry, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon flax seed meal or wheat germ
instructions:
Put ground flax seed meal or wheat germ into blender to grind and further breakdown. This will also eliminate any bitterness from the flax seed.
Place the banana, blueberries, peanut butter, honey, yogurt, and milk into the blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Janie's Amazing Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
instructions: Place the zucchini, ice cubes, orange juice, sweetener, and vanilla extract into a blender. Cover, and blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: All-Fruit Smoothies
instructions: Pour pineapple juice into a blender and add banana, strawberries, and blueberries. Cover and blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses.

title: Cranberry-Orange Power Smoothie
instructions: Place cranberry juice, banana, orange, strawberries, sherbet, ice, and protein powder in the bowl of a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about one minute. Adjust the consistency by adding more sherbet if it's too thin, or more cranberry juice if it's too thick. Pour into two glasses and use a straw!

title: Hailey's Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine the kiwis, frozen bananas, blueberries, yogurt, crushed ice, honey and almond extract. Blend until smooth.

title: Superfood Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup brewed green tea, chilled, or more to taste
instructions: Combine spinach, kale, pear, banana, blueberries, yogurt, ice cubes, and ground flax seeds in a blender; pour in tea. Blend on high until mixture is smooth. Mix with a wooden spoon to redistribute ingredients if needed.

title: Dairy-Free Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend coconut milk, banana, peanut butter, and honey in a blender until smooth, about 1 minute. Add ice and blend again until the ice is crushed, 2 to 3 minutes.

title: Chocolate Covered Blueberry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope instant hot chocolate mix
instructions: Pour the milk, blueberries, hot cocoa mix, and chocolate syrup into the container of a blender. Blend to desired consistency, and pour into a tall glass.

title: Mocha-Coco Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut or almond creamer
2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
instructions:
Fill an ice cube tray with coffee and freeze 4 hours or until completely frozen. Reserve remaining chilled coffee.
In a blender, place 1 cup coffee ice cubes along with 3/4 cup chilled coffee, banana, creamer, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and stevia. Blend until smooth.

title: Cinnamon Apple Healthy Smoothie
instructions: Pour apple juice into a blender; top with pear, apple, spinach, cinnamon, and ice in that order. Cover and blend until smooth.

title: Pumpkin-Apple Smoothie
instructions: Combine pumpkin puree, applesauce, apple juice, and soy milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Chia Ginger Smoothie
instructions: Layer cucumber, banana, ginger, and chia seeds in a blender; add orange juice. Blend mixture until smooth, adding water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Raspberry and Apricot Smoothie
instructions: Blend raspberries, yogurt, ice, apricot, honey, flax seeds, and lemon juice together in a blender until smooth.

title: Purple Power Smoothie
ingredients: 2 dates, pitted, or more to taste
instructions: Combine bananas, kale, blueberries, almond milk, water, ground flax seeds, and dates in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Morning Matcha Smoothie
instructions: Blend milk, avocado, ice, vanilla protein powder, and matcha green tea powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Vodka Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, mix the vodka, orange juice, strawberries, orange sherbet, and ice. Blend until smooth.

title: Super Fresh Smoothie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste (optional)
instructions: Combine banana, kale, lime juice, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Mega Mango Smoothie
instructions: Place the mango, cottage cheese, ice cubes, orange juice, water, banana, honey, flax oil and vanilla in a blender. Blend for 2 minutes or until very smooth; serve immediately.

title: 4th of July Blast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup fresh blackberries, or more to taste
1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste (optional)
instructions: Place 1 cup blackberries, strawberries, banana, orange juice, and ice into a blender in that order, and blend on high speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses and top each serving with 3 blackberries for garnish.

title: Granana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
instructions: Blend the milk, apple, banana, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth; divide between 2 glasses to serve.

title: Creamy Pineapple and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Combine pineapple chunks, milk, banana, honey, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Banana Basil Smoothie
ingredients: 12 leaves fresh basil, or more to taste
instructions: Combine bananas, cream, basil, maple syrup, and ice cubes in a food processor or blender; blend until smooth.

title: Papaya Surprise Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, blend the papaya, banana, strawberries, milk, sugar, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Basil Strawberry Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend the basil, mango, strawberries, and water in a blender. Add sugar and ice cubes; blend again until smooth.

title: Island Smoothie
instructions: Combine the ice, pineapple juice, ginger ale, coconut milk, and sugar in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Banana Cherry Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, yogurt, milk, cherries, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Rainier Cherry Berry Smoothie
instructions: Combine banana, blueberries, vanilla yogurt, strawberries, cherries, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth, about 60 seconds.

title: Good Morning Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend water, romaine lettuce, cucumber, avocado, celery, spinach, and lemon juice together in a blender on high until smooth, about 30 seconds. Add ice, apple, and banana to blender and blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Blueberry Cucumber Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cucumber - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
instructions: Blend banana, cucumber, buttermilk, coconut water, and blueberry preserves together in a blender until smooth.

title: Chocolate and Blueberry Smoothie
instructions:
Mix together the cocoa powder and water in a small bowl until the cocoa is dissolved.
Place the cocoa mixture, milk, blueberries, sugar, and ice cubes into a blender; cover and blend until smooth, 30 to 45 seconds. Serve cold.

title: Tropical Sunshine Smoothie
ingredients: 1 sprig fresh chocolate mint, finely chopped
instructions: Blend banana, orange juice, mango, pineapple, coconut water, lime juice, mint in a blender until smooth.

title: Tomato Basil Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, tomato, mango, ice, and basil leaves together in a blender until smooth.

title: Super Green Tea Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup brewed green tea (such as Gold Peak®), chilled
1 banana, broken into chunks and frozen
instructions: Combine tea, spinach, kiwi, avocado, banana, and ginger in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Raspberry-OJ-Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend ice cubes, raspberries, orange juice, banana, yogurt, and honey in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Smoothie
instructions:
Place the pumpkin puree in a freezer bag; store in freezer for at least 24 hours.
Heat the bag of pumpkin puree in the microwave on HIGH to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour the milk into a blender. Add the brown sugar, cinnamon, and pumpkin; blend until smooth.

title: Creamy White Tea and Peach Smoothie
ingredients: 2 cups frozen sliced peaches or mango
1 cup Nordica 1% or Fat Free Cottage Cheese
instructions: Combine tea, peaches, cottage cheese, honey and lime juice in a blender. Blend on high speed for 2 minutes or until very smooth. (Adjust sweetness to taste.) Serve immediately.

title: Cranberry Orange Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Breeze Almondmilk
instructions: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth.

title: Energy Elixir Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup spring salad greens, or to taste
instructions: Layer salad greens, red grapes, banana, pear, and walnuts in a high-powered blender; add enough water to cover. Blend mixture until smooth, adding more water to reach desired consistency.

title: Banana Pina Colada Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup coconut juice blend, or more to taste
instructions: Blend banana, coconut juice blend, pineapple, ice, and agave nectar together in a blender until smooth.

title: Avocado and Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine milk, strawberries, and avocado in a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, kale, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Serve over ice.

title: Wild Pina Colada Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped pitted dates, or more to taste
instructions: Blend pineapple, coconut water, ice cubes, dandelion greens, coconut, cashews, and dates in a blender until smooth and creamy.

title: Berry-nana Soy Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup frozen blueberries or frozen berry mix
instructions: Puree all ingredients in blender on high until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Blueberry Smoothie
instructions: Blend the blueberries, yogurt, milk, sugar, vanilla, and nutmeg in a blender until frothy, scraping down the sides of the blender with a spatula occasionally. Serve immediately.

title: Beet-Red Raspberry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) container lemon non-fat Greek yogurt
instructions:
Place all ingredients in Oster(R) Versa(R) Performance Blender in order listed.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately.

title: Pre-Packaged Smoothies
instructions: Transfer each container of yogurt into a muffin cup and freeze solid, about 4 hours. Remove frozen yogurt; place 1 portion of frozen yogurt into a resealable plastic bag and add 1/2 cup strawberries, 1/2 cup blueberries, and half a banana to each bag. Store the bags in the freezer until serving time. Place contents of a bag into a blender and blend until smooth.

title: BlueCar Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, yogurt, banana, blueberries, and cardamom together in a blender until smooth.

title: Vegan Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend coconut water, spinach, banana, strawberries, and dates together in a blender.

title: Supergirl Summer Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup orange juice, or as needed
instructions: Place bananas, papaya, pineapple, honeydew, grapes, ice cubes, and yogurt into the bowl of a blender. Pour in orange juice. Cover and puree until smooth, adding additional orange juice if needed to achieve desired consistency.

title: Raspberry Lemon Smoothie
instructions: Place the ice into a blender pitcher. Add the yogurt, lemon quarters, raspberries, and honey. Cover, and blend until the mixture is smooth, or to your desired consistency. Pour into chilled glasses to serve.

title: Creamy Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie
instructions: Blend pineapple juice, yogurt, strawberries, and banana together in a blender until smooth.

title: Turmeric Mango Smoothie
instructions: Combine bananas, mango, cashew butter, and turmeric powder in a blender; add water. Blend mixture until smooth.

title: Chocolate, Strawberry, and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend soy milk, yogurt, bananas, strawberries, flax seed, and chia seeds in a blender until smooth.

title: Banana Coconut Smoothie
instructions: Blend the banana, milk, coconut cream, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

title: A Very Intense Fruit Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine frozen fruit, canned fruit and honey. Blend until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Apple Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, apple, banana, pumpkin puree, dates, ice, chia seeds, oats, hemp seeds, pumpkin pie spice, molasses, honey, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Banana Tofu Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, milk, pumpkin, tofu, almonds, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a blender until smooth.

title: Hot Protein-Packed Mocha Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon agave nectar, or to taste
instructions: Place almond milk, hemp seeds, chia seeds, almond butter, cocoa powder, instant coffee, and agave nectar in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a small saucepan and heat, stirring frequently, over medium-low heat until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes. Pour into a mug.

title: Frozen Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup frozen berries (marionberries, raspberries, and blueberries)
instructions: Combine milk, berries, brown sugar, grape juice, vanilla extract, and ice cube in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Raw Mango Monster Smoothie
ingredients: 1/3 cup water, or more to taste
2 leaves kale, or more to taste
instructions:
Blend flax seeds in a blender until finely ground; add pepitas and blend until ground, about 1 minute.
Place mango, banana, water, ice cubes, and kale in the blender; blend until smooth, kale is fully incorporated, and the smoothie is uniform in color, about 3 minutes. Thin with more water to reach desired consistency.

title: Banana Coconut Smoothie Bowl
instructions:
Blend 1/2 banana, peaches, applesauce, water, and coconut oil together in a blender until smooth; pour into a serving bowl.
Slice remaining half banana and arrange on top of smoothie. Add shredded coconut, almonds, and raisins.

title: Beet and Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 beet, peeled and cut into quarters
instructions: Blend spinach, beet, yogurt, raspberries, blueberries, ice cubes, and cucumber together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawnana Smoothie Bread
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Place yogurt, strawberries, milk, bananas and orange juice in blender or food processor; puree until smooth. Mix in sugar, nutmeg and vanilla.
In a medium bowl sift together flour, baking powder and baking soda. Stir flour mixture to the smoothie mixture until batter is smooth. Pour into prepared pan.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean.

title: Green Slime Smoothie
instructions:
Place the spinach in the freezer until frozen, at least 1 hour.
Combine the spinach, strawberries, banana, honey, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Thick and Creamy Banana Yogurt Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup plain yogurt, or more to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, bananas, honey, orange juice, and almond butter in a blender until smooth.

title: Mighty Melon Green Tea Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup brewed green tea (such as Gold Peak®), chilled
1 pear, cored and cut into chunks
4 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
instructions: Combine tea, pineapple, cantaloupe, pear, yogurt, and mint leaves in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Mango Super Smoothie
instructions: Blend coconut milk, aloe vera juice, almond butter, and honey together in a blender until smooth; add strawberries and mango and blend on high until smooth.

title: Rosy Rhubarb Smoothie
instructions: Blend rhubarb, banana, cranberry juice blend, vanilla yogurt, and red food coloring in a blender until smooth.

title: Lexi's Protein-Packed Smoothie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, strawberries, tofu, banana, milk, and sugar together in a blender until desired consistency is reached.

title: Creamy  Strawberry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 medium ripe banana, peeled and halved
instructions:
Place all ingredients in Oster(R) Versa(R) Performance Blender in order listed.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately.

title: PeepSmoothies
instructions: Blend ice cubes, milk, lemonade, water, marshmallow chicks, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Holiday Sweet Tart Smoothie
instructions: Blend grapes, water, cranberries, ice cubes, and apple in a blender until smooth. Adjust by adding additional water a little at a time to achieve the consistency desired.

title: Probiotic Peanut Butter-Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
instructions: In a blender combine blueberries, kefir, peanut butter, stevia, flax, vanilla, and cinnamon. Blend until smooth.

title: Ginger Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
instructions: Blend water, blueberries, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and smooth.

title: Cucumber-Honeydew Smoothie
ingredients: 8 sprigs fresh mint, or amount to taste
instructions: Combine cucumber, honeydew melon, passion fruit juice, and ice in a blender. Pull leaves from mint springs and add to blender. Blend mixture until smooth. Pour into tall glasses.

title: Protein Packed Spinach Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened apple juice, or to taste
instructions: Place spinach, bananas, tofu, coconut, peaches, pineapple, mango, and strawberries, respectively, in a blender; pour in apple juice. Blend until desired consistency is reached, adding more apple juice as necessary.

title: Toddler Smoothie
instructions:
Prick sweet potato all over with a fork. Microwave on high in 2-minute intervals until tender, turning halfway through, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool sweet potato until easily handled, about 10 minutes.
Peel sweet potato and mash coarsely with a fork. Measure out 2 tablespoons and place in a blender. Add banana, Greek yogurt, orange juice, and strawberries; blend until smooth.

title: Cabbage, Peach, and Carrot Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
instructions: Blend grapes, peaches, cabbage, carrot, ice cubes, and water in a high-powered blender (such as a Vitamix(R)) until desired consistency is reached.

title: Dragon Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend almonds in a blender until chopped; add chocolate chips and coconut. Blend mixture until a coarse powder forms. Mix yogurt into almond mixture using a spoon; add dragon fruit, pineapple, and honey. Blend until desired consistency is reached.

title: Delicious Blueberry Smoothie
instructions: Place the apple juice, iced tea powder, blueberries, banana, and lemon juice into a blender pitcher. Blend on high until smooth.

title: Orange Juice Goji Berries Smoothie
instructions: Blend orange juice, goji berries, and ginger together in a high-powered blender until smooth and goji berries are pureed.

title: Pacific Smoothie
instructions: Blend the ice, banana, maple syrup, brown sugar, eggnog, orange juice, and vanilla yogurt together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pineapple Cleanser Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste
instructions: Blend coconut water, pineapple, celery, cucumber, parsley, lemon, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.

title: Caramel Apple Smoothie
instructions:
Pour the apple juice into a plastic container and freeze until hard, about 2 hours. Remove from container and break into pieces.
Place the frozen juice into the bowl of a blender along with the applesauce, yogurt, 1/4 cup of caramel topping, and peanut butter. Puree until smooth, then pour into 3 glasses; swirl in the remaining tablespoon of caramel topping before serving.

title: Berry Bloody Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons frozen raspberries, or to taste
instructions: Place frozen strawberries and raspberries into a blender, and pulse several times to break up the berries. Pour in half the orange juice with the blender running, and allow to blend until smooth and thick, about 30 seconds. If smoothie is too thick, blend in remaining orange juice. Serve immediately.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tablespoons frozen acai berry pulp, or as desired
instructions: Blend strawberries, pineapple, yogurt, coconut water, and acai pulp in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl. Top smoothie with kiwi, banana, blueberries, raspberries, almonds, granola, and chia seeds.

title: Cherry Berry Coconut Limeade Smoothie
instructions: Place cherries, coconut milk, strawberries, banana, and lime juice in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth.

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Smoothies
ingredients: 2 (3.25 ounce) cups Snack Pack® Chocolate Pudding
2 tablespoons Peter Pan® Creamy Peanut Butter
2 large ripe bananas, cut into pieces
instructions:
Place all ingredients, except Reddi-wip, in blender container; blend until smooth.
Divide evenly among 4 glasses; top each with 1 serving Reddi-wip. Serve immediately.

title: Mongolian Strawberry-Orange Juice Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine strawberries, orange juice, ice cubes and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Strawberry Blueberry Smoothies
instructions: Blend almond milk, strawberries, blueberries, yogurt, flax seed oil, and agave nectar in a blender until smooth.

title: Smoothie Bowl with Mango and Coconut
instructions:
Place mango chunks, almond milk, banana, coconut cream, and vanilla extract in a blender; puree until smoothie is thick and smooth. Pour into a serving bowl.
Top smoothie bowl with flaked coconut, goji berries, and chia seeds.

title: Bok Choy Thai Green Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons broccoli sprouts, or to taste
instructions: Combine coconut water, banana, apple, bok choy, sprouts, coconut, chia seeds, ginger, and spirulina powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Breakfast Smoothie
instructions: Blend bananas, almond milk, ice, peanut butter, wheat germ, flax seed, and honey in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Pie Smoothie for 2
instructions: Blend ice cubes, banana, yogurt, pumpkin, cinnamon, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.

title: Frozen Strawberry Smoothie Bars
instructions:
Blend strawberries, yogurt, apple juice, and honey in a blender until smooth.
Pour blended mixture into ice pop molds; freeze until solid, about 12 hours.

title: Supercharged Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups almond milk, or as needed
1 apple, cored and cut into chunks
instructions: Blend almond milk, oats, strawberries, blueberries, clementines, apple, avocado, flax seeds, honey, coconut oil, and chia seeds together in a blender until smooth, 30 to 60 seconds.

title: Yam Smoothie
instructions:
Prick yams with a fork, and place on a plate. Cook in the microwave for 8 to 10 minutes, turning once, until tender. Cool, peel and dice.
Combine the yams, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, sugar and banana in the container of a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Banana Smoothie II
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, milk, egg, wheat germ, honey, vanilla and nutmeg. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and serve.

title: Carrot, Apple, Cucumber, OJ, and Turmeric Smoothie
instructions: Combine orange juice, cucumber, carrots, apple, ice cubes, kale, lemon juice, flax seeds, chia seeds, and turmeric in a high-powered blender; blend until smooth.

title: Spinach and Kale Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, almond milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and kale together in a blender until smooth. Add banana and blend until smooth.

title: Green Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, kale, flax seed meal, and coconut oil into a blender, pour in the milk and orange juice. Cover, and puree until smooth; serve.

title: Orange Sunrise Smoothie
instructions: Combine the orange juice, banana, peach, honeydew melon, yogurt, sugar, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, or chunky, as desired. Pour into two glasses and serve.

title: Peachy Mango Cucumber Tea Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup brewed black tea (such as Gold Peak®), chilled
instructions: Combine tea, peach, mango, cucumber, yogurt, ginger, and honey in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Orange Pineapple Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can canned pineapple chunks, undrained
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine pineapple, orange juice concentrate with juice, rum, sugar, lime juice and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses, garnish with cherries, and serve.

title: Tropical Teaser Smoothie
instructions: Blend soy milk, pineapple, cantaloupe, tofu, lime juice, and coconut extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Morning Energy Booster Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
instructions: Pour prune juice into a blender. Layer Greek yogurt, spinach, blueberries, strawberries, peach, and flax seeds in the blender, in this order. Start blender on low speed and gradually increase speed until smoothie is well blended.

title: Raspberry-Coconut Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
instructions:
In a blender, combine banana, raspberries, almond-coconut milk, stevia, coconut oil, and vanilla. Blend until smooth, adding a little more milk if needed.
Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with berries, coconut, and chia seeds.

title: Beet, Carrot, Almond, Ginger, and Spirulina Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
instructions: Blend beet, carrots, and ginger together in a blender until smooth. Add water if mixture is too thick. Add almonds to beet mixture and blend until smooth. Add spirulina and ice and blend until smooth.

title: Green Monster Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, apples, bananas, carrots, orange juice, strawberries, and ice in a blender until smooth.

title: Banana Chocolate Almond Milk Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces dark chocolate bar (such as Hershey's® Special Dark), broken into pieces
instructions: Combine almond milk, banana, dark chocolate, and protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Oatmeal PB and Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup coconut milk beverage (such as Silk®)
3 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
instructions: Place oats in a blender and blend until a fine powder forms; add coconut milk beverage, banana, powdered peanut butter, and agave nectar. Blend until smooth.

title: Healthy Strawberry Apriplum Yogurt Smoothie
ingredients: 2 apriplums, pitted and sliced into sections
1/3 cup nonfat vanilla Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
instructions: Combine strawberries, apriplums, yogurt, coconut, flax seed in a blender. Pour in milk; pulse until smooth.

title: Banana and Brazil Nut Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 frozen banana, cut into small chunks
instructions:
Pour enough spring water over Brazil nuts in a bowl to cover by several inches; soak in refrigerator 8 hours to overnight.
Drain Brazil nuts and put them into a blender; add banana, kefir, amaranth, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, and honey. Blend mixture until smooth, adding spring water as needed to reach desired consistency.

title: Orange Smoothie
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, vanilla, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Superfood Smoothie
instructions: Combine baby spinach, Greek yogurt, honeydew melon, pear, milk, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Apple Pie Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons brown sugar, or to taste
instructions:
Place apple in a plastic microwave-safe bowl; pour in enough water to cover 1/4-inch of the bottom of bowl. Partially cover bowl with a lid or paper towel. Microwave in 1 minute intervals until apple is softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Freeze apple in the same container with water until solid, 2 hours to overnight.

title: Herbal Chicken Sandwiches with Apple-Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: Two 6-ounce boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into small bite-size cubes
2 cups plus 3 tablespoons fat-free plain Greek yogurt
1 cup packed mixed baby salad greens
6 sprigs fresh basil or mint leaves
2 Granny Smith apples, cored, skin on and chopped
instructions:
For the chicken salad: Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a large saucepan. Turn off the heat, add the tea bags and steep for 5 minutes.
Remove the tea bags and bring back to a rolling boil. Stir in 1/2 teaspoon salt and the chicken. Cover, reduce the heat to low and poach until fully cooked, about 7 minutes. Drain and transfer the chicken to a small bowl to cool to room temperature.
Stir together the onions, 3 tablespoons of the yogurt, the mayonnaise, basil, tarragon, vinegar and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large bowl. Stir in the cooled chicken, cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to combine. (Can be made and refrigerated a day ahead.)
Toast the almonds in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirring constantly, until golden, 3 to 4 minutes.
Divide the chicken among four of the bread slices. Top each with the toasted almonds, salad greens and the remaining bread slices. Cut in half.
For the smoothies: Combine the apple juice, 1 cup ice, lime juice, basil, apples and avocado together in a blender, and pulse until the ice is incorporated. Then puree until smooth. Divide evenly among four glasses.
Serve each sandwich with a smoothie and 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt topped with 1 tablespoon of raspberry jam.

title: Mango Smoothie

Remove the skin by peeling or cutting the fruit carefully off it. Repeat with the other mango. Discard the skin and puree the flesh and juice in a food processor or blender.
Add the milk and sugar, and combine until it becomes a thick smooth mass. Transfer the liquid to a pitcher and chill the mixture until ready to drink. Add the ice cubes to the pitcher and serve straight from the refrigerator. A little goes a long way, so serve in small glasses.
